price: 85. Y dijo a su padre y a su pueblo: “¿Qué es lo que adoran?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mādhā taʿbudūna
